headline: Lockheed's Arm Secures a $198M Contract to Support Sonar Systems
summary: LMT's Rotary and Mission Systems unit wins a $198M U.S. Navy contract to support next-gen sonar system upgrades.

headline: Raytheon from RTX Demonstrates Autonomous Barracuda Mine Neutralization Vehicle
summary: RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) is one of the best manufacturing stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On July 8, Raytheon, which is an RTX business, demonstrated the autonomous capabilities of its Barracuda mine neutralization vehicle for the first time in an untethered and semi-autonomous operation. The open water testing took place in Narragansett Bay, where […]

headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in RTX (RTX): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for RTX (RTX) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
